archimate:Capability.name: Financial Instrument Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Ability to administer, valuate, and report on a tradeable asset, such as stocks, bonds, bills of exchange, futures, options, evidence of ownership, and cash.

properties.value: Ability to administer, valuate, and report on a tradeable asset, such as stocks, bonds, bills of exchange, futures, options, evidence of ownership, and cash.
